nodes.text:
Up close the sphere isn’t reflective so much as decisive. (pause)
Most angles: matte insulation scuffed like it’s been cleaned too carefully. (pause)
One angle: your silhouette returns with a half-second delay as if the surface waits for permission. (pause)
Your throat tightens and you file it as particulate interference.

A metal placard is bolted on crooked. (pause)
It reads: CONTAINMENT SPHERE — DO NOT POLISH. (pause)
Someone underlined DO NOT twice, in marker dried into the grain, wanting permanence.
